title: Expert Insight Series: Why We Built This Site in 2026 (Yes, Really)
author: Arto Wallin
excerpt: Project websites aren’t exactly hot stuff in 2026. But after thinking it through, we realized we had a very practical problem: the AI-for-software landscape changes weekly, the best signals are scattered, and most “authoritative” publications arrive late. This site exists to reduce the noise—by curating what matters for our project and partners.
